kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
Hi Sean, let me address those questions...
1. Yes this occurs on all environments, locally, QA, UAT, PROD 2. We are simply obtaining the Url of the asset retrieved similar to...\ <https://docs.kentico.com/developers-and-admins/development/content-retrieval/retrieve-content-items#retrieve-assets> 3. Its across all environments 4. Yeah, that is where I obtained the hash string salt value I am using 5. We're not deploying the website and content item through CD deployment. We are authoring them on each respective environment
